Why Press only Iran & not other suspend  uranium enrichment program like North Korea ? Who do you identify with of the ten lepers that were healed, the one that came back and gave thanks? or the nine that did not? But the older I get - the more I see that it's ALL about God...and to Him be the Glory, forever and ever.  Amen.

pick the biggest fraction? A.2/4
B.3/4
C.4/8
D.4/5 The common denominator is 40:

A. 2/4 = 20/40
B. 3/4 = 30/40
C. 4/8 = 20/40
D. 4/5 = 32/40

So D (4/5) is the biggest fraction.

geometry help? The center of gravity of a triangular solid with uniform thickness and density is...

a. the point shared by a triangle's medians
b. the centroid
c. the point shared by a triangle's altitudes
d. the circumcenter

anyone know? i've tried looking for the answer but have found nothing. =[ (b)  Centroid  is definitely the correct answer by definition of the word centroid. The centroid is the center of mass or inertia, or gravity of an object of uniform density.

You were not asked how to find the center of gravity of a solid, only what it is called.

on what basis can sedimentary rocks be identified? [Lab 2-4: sedimentary rock identification] Sedimentary Rocks usually have layers and are made up of pieces of other rocks. State height of triangle, in terms of X, given area = 5 square meters and base is 2X? Answer is 5/X, but I don't understand it Area = 5 square meters
Base = 2x
Area of any triangle = (Base*Height)/2
5 = (2x*Height)/2
5 = x*Height (The 2's cancel each other out)
x*Height = 5
Height = 5/x(Divide both sides by 'x')

I hope that helped

how do i get online wif my psp? after scanning and getting an ssid,i test the connection and an error occurs askin of some wlan security setting stuff. what do i type there? This will depend on your wireless security configuration. On lower firmwares the PSP encountered problems dealing with anything greater than 128-WEP encryption. To resolve your issue, you can:

- Disable your wireless routers security. (obviously not recommended)
- Change your current security settings to 128-WEP or lower.
- Update your PSP firmware to include support for later wireless security standards.

i want use the linux apache webserver, where shoul i insert my web forlder in linux operating system? could you please tell me in which is the web folder in linux operating system.

eg in iis > c:/inetpub/wwwroot/
similarly
in linux which folder ? Hello, if you already have Apache installed, then look at the folder /var/www/htdocs/. This is the default web folder of the apache on a default installation. Further, you can go to the Apache configuration file , httpd.conf and look for "DocumentRoot". The value corresponding to this is your web folder.

- you save some tax money
- you benefit a charitable organization
- someone who will enjoy the Beanies will get them

what is family planning? how does family planning work family planning

A program to regulate the number and spacing of children in a family through the practice of contraception or other methods of birth control.

Methods of Family Planning

Male birth control methods include withdrawal of the male before ejaculation (the oldest contraceptive technique) and use of the condom, a rubber sheath covering the penis. The condom, because of its use as a protection against sexually transmitted diseases, including AIDS, has become a frequently used birth control device.
